com.friendlyreminder.application.person

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.friendlyreminder.application.person.Person
      • com.friendlyreminder.application.person.User

  • @Entity
public class User
extends Person
    Class to represent a User of the application - handles login credentials (username and password) - contains zero or more ContactBooks

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String password)
     throws InvalidUsernameException,
            InvalidPasswordException
        Constructs User object with a username and password
        Parameters:
        username - username (can't be empty)
        password - password (can't be empty)
        Throws:
        InvalidUsernameException - thrown if username is empty
        InvalidPasswordException - thrown if password is empty

    • Method Detail

      • validatePassword

        public java.lang.Boolean validatePassword(java.lang.String password)
        Method to check if password matches member password (successful login), as password is private and has no getter
        Parameters:
        password - password to check this.password against
        Returns:
        true if password is correct, if not matched (or null) returns false

      • changePassword

        public java.lang.Boolean changePassword(java.lang.String oldPassword,
                                        java.lang.String newPassword)
        Method to change password of User
        Parameters:
        oldPassword - current password, can be null if instance does not yet have password
        newPassword - password to set
        Returns:
        true if change is successful otherwise false
